summary: SERPETINE BELT HAS SHREDDED TWO TIMES IN THE LAST TWO MONTHS.  A SMALL SECTION OF THE BELT ON  THE INNER SIDE NEXT TO THE ENGINE APPEARED TO HAVE BEEN CUT, BOTH TIMES THIS OCCURRED THE DAMAGE WAS THE SAME.  VEHICLE HAD 99,000 MILES AND WAS WELL MAINTAINED.  THIS EVENT NEVER OCCURRED UNTIL THE VEHICLE WAS OVER 95,000 MILES.        *TT
